about.heroSubtitle: Welcome to AfghanHealth ‚Äî your trusted digital gateway to accessible, secure, and efficient healthcare services.
about.whoPara1: AfghanHealth is a secure web-based telemedicine platform designed to improve access to healthcare services across Afghanistan, particularly in remote and underserved areas.
about.whoPara2: Our aim is to empower patients by connecting them with licensed doctors through real-time consultations, appointment scheduling, and health education in Pashto, Dari, and English.
about.visionDesc: To become the most reliable and inclusive digital healthcare platform in Afghanistan, bridging the gap between patients and healthcare providers across all regions.

1.title: Innovation
1.text: We use the MERN stack and cutting-edge web technologies to deliver a responsive, secure, and scalable healthcare platform.

2.title: Trust
2.text: Patient privacy and data security are our highest priorities. We follow encryption standards and privacy protocols to ensure confidentiality.

3.title: Accessibility
3.text: Our platform is mobile-friendly, multilingual, and optimized for low-bandwidth users to ensure nationwide reach.

1.title: Quick Appointment Booking
1.text: Schedule doctor visits effortlessly in just a few clicks from your device.

2.title: Verified Doctors
2.text: All doctors are carefully screened and verified for your safety and trust.

3.title: Health Education & Smart Reminders
3.text: Access medical articles in local languages and receive appointment reminders automatically.

2024.title: 2024 ‚Äì Idea Initiated
2024.desc: AfghanHealth services was envisioned as a response to rural healthcare access challenges in Afghanistan.

2025a.title: 2025 ‚Äì Development Phase
2025a.desc: Our team began building the platform using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB.

2025b.title: 2025 ‚Äì National Reach
2025b.desc: AfghanHealth now connects patients with doctors across multiple Afghan provinces.

1.text: I can now consult a doctor in my own language without leaving my home.
1.author: Zahra M., Kandahar

2.text: Finally, a platform that brings real medical help to rural villages.

symptoms.title: Fever
symptoms.desc: Feeling hot or having a high temperature when you're sick.

symptoms.title: Chest Pain
symptoms.desc: Pain or pressure in your chest, around neck and left shoulder like someone is squeezing it.

symptoms.title: Abdominal Pain
symptoms.desc: Pain or cramps in your tummy, making it feel uncomfortable.

symptoms.title: Skin Rash
symptoms.desc: Redness, itchiness, or bumps on your skin, making it feel irritated.

symptoms.title: Dengue Fever
symptoms.desc: Fever, severe headache, muscle pain, and rash caused by mosquito bites.

symptoms.title: Heart Disease
symptoms.desc: Heart problems make you feel chest pain, short of breath, or tired.

symptoms.title: Diabetes
symptoms.desc: Having too much sugar in your blood, making you thirsty and tired.

symptoms.title: Gastritis
symptoms.desc: Stomach pain, feeling sick, and indigestion from eating certain foods.

symptoms.title: Vaginal Infection
symptoms.desc: Discomfort or itching in your private area, with unusual discharge.

symptoms.title: Cancer
symptoms.desc: Tumor or unusual growth at any part of the body. Pain in that area or feeling of discomfort.
